name: 2ralimi
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)))

stmt.origin: ralimi(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0), wral(s1, c1, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)))
-| wi(wral(s1, c1, w0), wral(s1, c1, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)))
-| wi(wral(s1, c1, w0), wral(s1, c1, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wral(s1, c1, w0), wral(s1, c1, w1))
-| wi(w0, w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w0)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, w1)))
-| wi(w0, w1)

comment: Inference quantifying both antecedent and consequent two times, with strong hypothesis. (Contributed by AV, 3-Dec-2021.)
